title: Buñuel in the Labyrinth of the Turtles
originalTitle: Buñuel en el laberinto de las tortugas
synopsis: Natália, trapped in a tedious job, engages in a search for a stolen heart. In a world where hearts can be deposited in a bank, the protagonist faces a dilemma: give her heart or keep it to herself.

title: A Man Is Dead
synopsis: Brest, 1950. Post-war reconstruction efforts in France have led to poor working conditions. The workers are on strike calling in vain for higher wages. P’tit Zef, Édouard (Mazé), and Désiré take part in demonstrations organized by the CGT syndicate when the situation suddenly becomes violent. The police shoot into the crowd and a bullet hits Édouard. The labor union calls upon the filmmaker René Vautier to film the events. P’tit Zef and Désiré accompany Vautier through the devastated city. Having at his side a man whose only weapon is a camera, P’tit Zef is consumed with anger. He wants revenge for the death of his friend.

title: Apart
synopsis: A layered animation technique slowly reveals three personal stories of grief. The young characters open up with calm, honest observations about the perspective-shifting experience of suddenly losing a parent.

title: Barbeque
synopsis: This film is a journey through the methods of coping with post-traumatic stress disorder, and an exploration of shame and feelings of disembodiment.

title: Between the Shadows
synopsis: Natália, trapped in a tedious job, engages in a search for a stolen heart. In a world where hearts can be deposited in a bank, the protagonist faces a dilemma: give her heart or keep it to herself.

title: Bless You!
synopsis: Everyone gets sick of everyone. But things become really bad when you get sick of yourself.

title: The Call
synopsis: An elderly woman’s bathtub becomes a place from which to escape into memories, fantasies, and other watery reveries.

title: Carlotta's Face
synopsis: As a child, Carlotta didn’t expect the people around her to have faces. She doesn’t even recognize her own face. Years later, she learns about a rare, untreatable deficit of her brain. It was art, after all, that offered her a way to finally recognize herself.

title: Cat Days
synopsis: Jiro, a little boy, feels sick and his father takes him to the doctor, who diagnoses him with a harmless condition. Nonetheless, it shakes the core of the boy’s identity.

title: The Cord
synopsis: A mother, dominating her son with the wrong kind of love and care, won’t let him grow up but preserves his inner child in a helpless state of infantile dependency.

title: Dachshund
synopsis: The dachshund doesn’t get why its behind always has to pee.

title: The Death, Dad & Son
synopsis: Death’s son doesn’t want to take over the family business. He secretly dreams of becoming a guardian angel, this triggers a succession of collapses. Dad will have to get him out of this mess.

title: Deep Love
synopsis: Deep love has finally happened in Ukraine.

title: Elise
synopsis: Alzheimer’s disease is preventing Elise from understanding the world around her. Soon, her daughter, her last anchor to reality, won’t be enough to keep her from diving into her memories.

title: First Thirst
synopsis: A monster is after a tribe of apes, only to find a big surprise.

title: The Flood is Coming
synopsis: A forest hermit tries to prepare for a flood, but he becomes distracted by his noisy neighbor -who happens to be the hermit’s left eye. The Flood is Coming explores the growing anxiety about the state of nature and our place in it.

title: Gerda Wunsch
synopsis: A documentary story about holocaust survivor Gerda Wunsch, and her early life: as a child escaping from a concentration camp in Poland, the loss of her father Alois, the years of fear and terror spent in hiding – and when the war was over, the return to Vienna.

title: Guilt
synopsis: Alcohol turns a loving mother into a wolf, forming a difficult relationship with her daughter. A childhood full of love is confronted with a parent’s depression.

title: Heatwave
synopsis: In this hybrid animation film, combining cut out, claymation and thousands of replacements pieces, two little children find a way to cool everyone down in the midst of a searing heatwave.

title: Hide n Seek
synopsis: A story about the flow and perception of time. The young boy becomes an old man and his life shrinks to a game of hide-and-seek, which he tries to win.

title: Hier
synopsis: Completely alone in a black space, I make a phone call. A film on the verge of cinema and theatre.

title: Hopus
synopsis: Animals compete in this ski jumping championship. With unexpected twists, we follow the competition to the bitter end.

title: Icebergs
synopsis: 14 short dark comedy vignettes, ranging from the mundane to the absurd. Based on the book Scenes by Efthymis Filippou (co-writer Dogtooth, Alps, The Lobster).

title: Kids
synopsis: An exploration of group dynamics. How do we define ourselves when we are all equal? The short film is accompanied by an interactive animation for computer.

title: The Kite
synopsis: Summer is coming to the end, the fruit is growing ripe on the trees. Grandpa gives his grandson a kite. As the boy is tossed around in the air, Grandpa catches him. Then the leaves fall and Grandpa has grown weak. A strong autumn wind carries him off into the cloudy sky. Winter comes, then springtime. A warm breeze brings them together again.

title: Knagglig
synopsis: Exploring the comedy of daily life by zooming in on self-optimization – and the struggle it entails.

title: Lanes
synopsis: People pursue their paths: day by day, by choice or by necessity, seeking happiness, finding uncertainty. Where should – can – must we go?

title: Las del dinte
synopsis: Girls are weird. Babies are weird. Bodies are extra weird. Here, women are tired of choosing between having kids and their careers. Now anomalies in the reproductive system are celebrated instead of stigmatized.

title: The Last Day of Autumn
synopsis: Forest animals secretly collect bike parts to build vehicles that fit their size. A great race is being prepared.

title: Live a Little
synopsis: Against the pressures that go into being a ”good woman” in a patriarchal society, let’s celebrate women who decide to not care.

title: Masquerade
synopsis: Who are you really beneath all your masks?

title: Metamorphosis
synopsis: In his thirties and still living with his mother, a man decides to break free from his inner demons.

title: The Monster
synopsis: Living a constant adolescent drama with the monster inside her mind, a young girl embarks on a spiritual journey to make peace with herself and with the ones around her.

title: Mother and Milk
synopsis: A mom just gave birth. A flood of breast milk covers everything – her home, work, friends, relationship and a good night’s sleep.

title: Muybridge’s Disobedient Horses
synopsis: What happens when we use everyday situations, objects, spaces and actions as cinematographic mechanisms? Can we find the essence of cinematic illusion when we look into everyday life?

title: Nest
synopsis: A slightly naïve paradise bird is going out of his way to attract a mate.

title: Night Moves
synopsis: Deep in the night when everyone is fast asleep, funny shapes and jolly beasts rumble through the bedroom. There is so much to discover!

title: Nine Lives
synopsis: I’m an old, grumpy cat. Everybody hates me and I hate everybody. I hate this day just like all other days. But I think this day will be the last one.Yes, today I will end it all.How hard can it be?

title: Noctuelle
synopsis: The main character, Noctuelle, is the creator of the butterflies that bring dreams to people. There is also another character, the bat, who is the exact opposite of Noctuelle.

title: La Noria
synopsis: A young boy who loves to draw and build Ferris wheels encounters strange creatures that turn his life upside down.

title: O, Hunter Heart
synopsis: Nature and domesticity collide in a dark tale of love and loss.

title: One Pair Cote
synopsis: Jolanda and Hendrik are a couple. They have a very close relationship. Hendrik is her favorite coat to put on. We witness a day in their life.

title: Opinci
synopsis: A film based on a true story about a recordbreaking globetrotter and single father who attempts to explain to his young daughter about death, courage and the absence of her mother from their lives.

title: Poetika Anima
synopsis: A lyrical poem created by the synthesis of the director’s diary notes, about a woman who transforms her disheartenment within a ﬂuid spacetime.

title: Portrait of Suzanne
synopsis: In a small hotel, there is a man who tries to stop his hunger for love by eating excessively. Unexpectedly, his left foot transforms into his lost lover, Suzanne. Still, this is just the beginning of a surreal story, made of plasticine, about loneliness, jealousy, and love.

title: Purpleboy
synopsis: Oscar is a child who sprouts in his parent’s garden. One day Oscar lives an extraordinary but painful adventure in an authoritarian and oppressive world. Will he manage to have the identity recognition he desires so much?

title: The Rain
synopsis: A depiction of collective consciousness, the struggle between an individual and group hypnosis. If we have no accountability for our actions we could be pushed to thoughtlessly follow the crowd, with tragic consequences.

title: Selfies
synopsis: Digital self-portraits, hundreds of quaint, embarrassing and disturbing selfies, arranged in a short film composition.

title: Sh_t Happens
synopsis: The caretaker exhausted by everything, his frustrated wife and one totally depressed deer. Their mutual despair leads them to absurd events, because… shit happens all the time.

title: Soy una tumba
synopsis: Every night a boy watches his father unload a cargo of contraband tobacco. But one night it’s not tobacco…

title: Story
synopsis: Digital technology shapes our lives and our reality. Can we still tell where the screen ends and the outside world begins?

title: Swatted
synopsis: Online players describe their struggles with “swatting”, a life-threatening cyber-harassment phenomenon that looms over them whenever they play. The events take shape through youtube videos and wireframe images from a video game.

title: Template Message
synopsis: What is exactly the fundamental tension between still picture and motion picture? Pictures are somehow bits of information: they converge, get ordered and eventually become unreadable.

title: Uncle Thomas: Accounting for the Days
originalTitle: Tio Tomás, A Contabilidade Dos Dias
synopsis: The film is a testament to the love for an eccentric, the object of artistic inspiration and key player in the director’s becoming a filmmaker. A tribute to a poet of the everyday.

title: Under the Rib Cage
synopsis: This is the story of a guy who’s gonna die… Maybe.

title: Until It Turns Black
synopsis: When the truth hurts and nothing can be changed, it seems like escape to the world of dreams is the only way out. Fantasy could relieve the pain, but is it a magic pill?

title: Untravel
synopsis: In a tiny country, history has left its mark and the future is in no hurry to happen. A young woman is curious about what is to be found beyond the border.

title: Why Slugs Have No Legs
synopsis: Slugs have a hard time keeping up with the pace of life in the city of insects. When a financial crisis hits, the industrious bees see only one solution.

title: You Are Still There
synopsis: Mrs. Pribil died at the age of 86 in the apartment shown in the film. Right until the end, only her husband’s name was written on the door plate, even though she survived him by many years. A visualization of a poem by Rose Ausländer.
